name: The Forgotten Forest
description: A dense, misty forest filled with ancient trees and the whispers of lost travelers. Strange runes are carved into the bark of the oldest oaks.

name: Sunlit Clearing
description: A bright circular meadow where sunlight breaks through the canopy. At the center stands a weathered stone altar covered in moss.

name: Goblin's Maw Cave
description: A damp, limestone cave that echoes with dripping water. The walls bear crude goblin graffiti and the air smells of wet fur.

name: Elven Ruins
description: Collapsed marble structures overgrown with ivy. Faint magical energy hums from broken arcane sigils on the ground.

name: Crystal Stream
description: A shallow brook with unnaturally blue water. Small fish with glowing scales dart between the rocks.

name: Underground Tunnels
description: A maze of narrow, torch-lit passages. The sound of pickaxes echoes from somewhere deeper in the complex.

name: Ruined Library
description: A circular chamber with water-damaged books floating in puddles. One intact bookshelf radiates protective magic.

name: Hidden Waterfall
description: A 30-foot cascade plunging into a deep pool. Behind the falls, a dark opening leads somewhere...

name: Goblin Barracks
description: A foul-smelling chamber filled with ragged bedrolls and stolen goods. The walls are scratched with tallies counting days.

name: Abandoned Forge
description: A stone furnace gone cold years ago. Unfinished weapons litter worktables, and a massive anvil sits off-center.

name: Moonlit Grotto
description: A cavern where bioluminescent fungi provide soft blue light. In the center, a perfect sphere of water floats mid-air.

name: Dwarven Vault
description: A perfectly cubic chamber with walls of polished granite. Runes glow faintly along the seams where walls meet.
